vote.title: To authorize the Director of Public Utilities to amend the 2022 Capital Improvement Budget for Professional Construction Management services used at the Department's wastewater treatment facilities; to authorize a transfer of cash and appropriation within the Sanitary Bonds Fund; to authorize the Auditor’s Office to establish an Auditor’s Certificate for the Professional Construction Management Services #3 Project for the Department of Public Utilities; to authorize the expenditure of up to $3,927,328.69 from the Sanitary Bonds Fund for the Professional Construction Management Services #3 Project; and to declare an emergency.  ($3,927,328.69)
vote.description: A motion was made by Rob Dorans, seconded by Nicholas Bankston, that this Ordinance be Approved. The motion carried by the following vote:
